title: Got a somewhat weird email, Riot is that from you?
body:
> Below you will find the accounts associated with your email address:
> 
> EU West
> ---------
> 
> GL;HF,
> Riot Games Account Protection Ninjas

From an adress called accounts@riotgames.com

Given that I do not see the point of sending this message, as I obviously know what my account is, I am a bit confused...

replies.body: Looks like someone requested a "forgot your username" on our website. If you weren't the one who submitted that request, hit up the EUW support agents in a ticket to make sure your account is still safe!

Hmm maybe I clicked it by accident... but yes, checking with the support might not be the worst idea. 

Thank you for your response.
